en.cmd_invalid: Invalid command. Select a valid command from the menu.
en.oc_menu:
Available options:
0. Cancel Command
1. Start Openclash
2. Stop Openclash
3. Restart Openclash
4. Reload configuration
5. Enable service autostart
6. Disable service autostart
7. Check if the service starts on boot
en.vnstat_menu:
Available options:
0. to exit.
1. Show 5 Minutes
2. Show Hours
3. Show Hours Graph
4. Show Days
5. Show Months
6. Show Years
7. Show Top Days
en.oc_invalid_cmd: Invalid option. Please select a valid option (1 to 7).
en.failed_get_ip: Failed to get public IP address.
en.adb_menu:
Available options:
0. Cancel Command.
1. See Devices.
2. Restart Tcpip 5555.
en.adb_invalid_cmd: Invalid option. Please choose 0 or 1 or 2.
en.down_link_aria: Please provide download link for aria2c:
en.down_path_aria:
Do you want to specify a custom download path for ARIA2c (default path is {PATH_ARIA})?
Send Y/Yes OR N/No OR 0 to cancel:
en.down_link_gdown: Provide a Google Drive file ID for gdown:
en.down_path_gdown:
Do you want to specify a custom download path for gdown (default path is {PATH_GDOWN})?
Send Y/Yes OR N/No OR 0 to cancel:
en.down_method:
Select download method:
1. Using Aria2c
2. Use Gdown

Or type '0' to Cancel
en.down_start_aria: Using Aria2c Download Started. Please wait...
en.down_start_gdown: Using Gdown Download Started. Please wait...
en.down_success:
Download complete. File is saved as:
{download_path}
en.get_ip_error: Unable to retrieve IP address for '{domain_name}'.
en.get_ip_invalid: Invalid option. Please select a valid option (1 to 7).
en.not_allow_user: You Are Not Allowed To Use These Bot Commands.

id.cmd_invalid: Perintah tidak valid. Pilih perintah yang valid dari menu.
id.oc_menu:
Opsi yang tersedia:
0. Batalkan Perintah
1. Mulai Openclash
2. Hentikan Openclash
3. Restart Openclash
4. Muat ulang konfigurasi
5. Aktifkan autostart layanan
6. Nonaktifkan autostart layanan
7. Periksa apakah layanan dimulai saat boot
id.vnstat_menu:
Opsi yang tersedia:
0. untuk keluar.
1. Tampilkan 5 Menit Terakhir
2. Tampilkan Jam
3. Tampilkan Grafik Jam
4. Tampilkan Hari
5. Tampilkan Bulan
6. Tampilkan Tahun
7. Tampilkan Hari Teratas
id.oc_invalid_cmd: Opsi tidak valid. Harap pilih opsi yang valid (1 hingga 7).
id.adb_menu:
Opsi yang tersedia:
0. Batalkan Perintah.
1. Lihat Perangkat.
2. Restart Tcpip 5555.
id.adb_invalid_cmd: Opsi tidak valid. Harap pilih 0 atau 1 atau 2.
id.down_link_aria: Harap berikan tautan unduhan untuk aria2c:
id.down_path_aria:

1. Menggunakan Aria2c
2. Gunakan Gdown

id.down_start_gdown: Unduhan dengan Gdown Dimulai. Harap tunggu...
